Lifelink, ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}{W} and exile an artifact or enchantment card from a graveyard. If you do, put a +/1+1 counter on Alessa, then target opponent takes a burden.
